Description:
Detects user agent and URI paths used by empire agents

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Empire UserAgent URI Combo
Query: c-useragent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko" (cs-uri="/admin/get.php" OR cs-uri="/news.php" OR cs-uri="/login/process.php") cs-method="POST"
